trans-unit.source: Serves as the base class for controls that reside in <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZoneBase"></xref> zones and are used to edit <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> controls.
trans-unit.target: Funge da classe base per i controlli che si trovano in <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZoneBase"> </xref> zone e vengono utilizzate per modificare <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> controlli.

trans-unit.source: The EditorPart class provides a base set of properties and methods that are used by the derived EditorPart controls provided with the Web Parts control set, and by custom EditorPart controls.
trans-unit.target: La classe EditorPart fornisce un set di base di proprietà e metodi utilizzati dai controlli EditorPart derivati forniti con il set di controlli Web part e dai controlli EditorPart personalizzati.

trans-unit.source: An EditorPart control allows a user to edit an associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control by modifying its layout, appearance, properties, behavior, or other characteristics.
trans-unit.target: Un controllo EditorPart consente a un utente di modificare un oggetto associato <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>controllo modificando il layout, l'aspetto, proprietà, il comportamento o altre caratteristiche.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: The editing user interface (UI), which consists of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZoneBase> zones that contain EditorPart controls, is displayed after a Web page enters edit mode.
trans-unit.target: L'interfaccia utente (UI), modifica costituito <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZoneBase>zone che contengono controlli EditorPart, viene visualizzata dopo che una pagina Web entra in modalità di modifica.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZoneBase>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > An EditorPart control can be used only within a zone that derives from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZoneBase> class, such as the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZone> control.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > EditorPart un controllo può essere utilizzato solo all'interno di una zona da cui deriva il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZoneBase>classe, ad esempio il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZone>controllo.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZone> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZoneBase>

trans-unit.source: After a page has entered edit mode, a user can select a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control to edit by clicking an edit verb on the verbs menu of the selected control.
trans-unit.target: Dopo che una pagina entrato in modalità di modifica, un utente può selezionare un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>controllo da modificare, fare clic su un verbo di modifica del menu dei verbi del controllo selezionato.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: Only one <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control can be edited at a time.
trans-unit.target: Un solo <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>controllo può essere modificato in una fase.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: Several derived EditorPart controls are provided with the Web Parts control set, as listed in the following table.
trans-unit.target: Vari controlli EditorPart derivati vengono forniti con il set di controlli Web part, come elencato nella tabella seguente.

trans-unit.source: These controls provide all the editing capabilities that are necessary for most applications.
trans-unit.target: Questi controlli forniscono tutte le funzionalità di modificare necessarie per la maggior parte delle applicazioni.

trans-unit.source: The typical approach for using these controls in a Web Parts page is to declare them in page persistence format within a `<zonetemplate>` element, where `<zonetemplate>` is the child element of an `<asp:editorzone>` element.
trans-unit.target: L'approccio tipico per l'utilizzo di questi controlli in una pagina Web part è la dichiarazione nel formato di persistenza di pagina all'interno di un `<zonetemplate>` elemento, in cui `<zonetemplate>` è l'elemento figlio di un `<asp:editorzone>` elemento.

trans-unit.source: For a code example, see the Example section of this topic.
trans-unit.target: Per un esempio di codice, vedere la sezione esempio di questo argomento.

trans-unit.source: |Type of control|Description| |---------------------|-----------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.AppearanceEditorPart>|Edits the appearance of the associated control, including properties such as its title text, height, width, and border attributes.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.BehaviorEditorPart>|Edits certain behaviors of the associated control, such as whether it can be edited, whether it can be closed, or whether it can be moved to another zone.
trans-unit.target: | Tipo di controllo | Descrizione | |---------------------|-----------------| | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.AppearanceEditorPart>| Modifica l'aspetto del controllo associato, comprese le proprietà, ad esempio il testo del titolo, altezza, larghezza e gli attributi di bordo. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.BehaviorEditorPart>| Modifica alcuni comportamenti del controllo associato, ad esempio che può essere modificato, che può essere chiuso o se può essere spostato in un'altra area.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.BehaviorEditorPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.AppearanceEditorPart>

trans-unit.source: This control is only visible on a page when a control is being edited in shared personalization scope.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart>|Edits layout attributes for the associated control, such as whether it is in a normal or minimized (collapsed) state, and what zone it is placed in.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PropertyGridEditorPart>|Edits properties of the associated control, if those properties were declared in the source code with a `WebBrowsable` attribute.| > [!NOTE] > To improve accessibility, all the EditorPart controls provided in the Web Parts control set are rendered within a `<fieldset>` element.
trans-unit.target: Questo controllo è visibile in una pagina solo durante la modifica di un controllo in ambito di personalizzazione condiviso. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart>| Modifica gli attributi di layout per il controllo associato, ad esempio se è in uno stato ridotto a icona o normale (compresso) e in quale zona viene inserito in. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PropertyGridEditorPart>| Modifica proprietà del controllo associato, se tali proprietà sono state dichiarate nel codice sorgente con un `WebBrowsable` attributo. | > [!NOTE] > Per migliorare l'accessibilità, tutti i EditorPart controlli forniti nelle Web part viene eseguito l'insieme di controlli in un `<fieldset>` elemento.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PropertyGridEditorPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart>

trans-unit.source: The `<fieldset>` element groups the related set of controls used for editing in a given EditorPart control, and it facilitates tabbed navigation among those controls for both visual user agents (such as ordinary Web browsers) and speech-oriented user agents (such as screen-reading software).
trans-unit.target: Il `<fieldset>` elemento raggruppa il set correlato di controlli utilizzati per la modifica in un determinato controllo EditorPart e facilita la navigazione a schede tra i controlli per gli agenti utente visivo (ad esempio i normali browser Web) e gli agenti utente di riconoscimento vocale (ad esempio un software di lettura dello schermo).

trans-unit.source: Initializes the class for use by an inherited class instance.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza la classe per l'uso da un'istanza di classe ereditata.

trans-unit.source: This constructor can be called only by an inherited class.
trans-unit.target: Questo costruttore può essere chiamato solo da una classe ereditata.

trans-unit.source: Saves the values in an <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart"></xref> control to the corresponding properties in the associated <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Salva i valori in un <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart"> </xref> controllo alle proprietà corrispondenti nell'oggetto associato <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> controllo.

trans-unit.source: The ApplyChanges method is a critical method on an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> control.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo ApplyChanges è di importanza critica in un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>controllo.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>

trans-unit.source: It is defined as an abstract method in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> class, and must be implemented by inherited controls.
trans-unit.target: Viene definito come un metodo astratto nel <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>classe e devono essere implementati da controlli ereditati.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>

trans-unit.source: The method's purpose is to save the values a user has entered into an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> control to the corresponding properties in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control that is referenced in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.WebPartToEdit%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Lo scopo del metodo consiste nel salvare i valori immessi da un utente in un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>controllo per le proprietà corrispondenti nella <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>controllo a cui fa riferimento il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.WebPartToEdit%2A>proprietà.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.WebPartToEdit%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>

trans-unit.source: The ApplyChanges method is called when the user clicks a button representing an OK or an apply verb in the editing user interface (UI).
trans-unit.target: Il metodo ApplyChanges viene chiamato quando l'utente sceglie un pulsante che rappresenta un OK o Applica nell'interfaccia utente (UI) modifica.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the action of saving values from the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart"></xref> control to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> control is successful; otherwise (if an error occurs), <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se l'azione di salvataggio dei valori di <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart"> </xref> controllo il <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> controllo ha esito positivo; in caso contrario (se si verifica un errore), <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether a control should be displayed when its associated <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> control is in edit mode.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un valore che indica se un controllo deve essere visualizzato quando l'identificatore associato <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> controllo si trova nella modalità di modifica.

trans-unit.source: At certain points in the editing process, the zone that contains an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> control checks the Display property to determine whether to display the control.
trans-unit.target: AT elaborare alcuni punti di modifica, l'area che contiene un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>controllo verifica la proprietà di visualizzazione per determinare se visualizzare il controllo.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>

trans-unit.source: There are two scenarios where the Display property returns `false` and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> control is not displayed.
trans-unit.target: Esistono due scenari in cui la proprietà di visualizzazione restituisce `false` e <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>controllo non viene visualizzato.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>

trans-unit.source: The first scenario occurs when the control being edited is a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPart> control.
trans-unit.target: Il primo scenario si verifica quando il controllo in fase di modifica è un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPart>controllo.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPart>

trans-unit.source: The second scenario occurs when the control being edited has its <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AllowEdit%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.IsShared%2A> properties set to `true`, while the page's personalization scope is set at user level.
trans-unit.target: Il secondo scenario si verifica quando il controllo in fase di modifica è relativa <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AllowEdit%2A>e <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.IsShared%2A>le proprietà impostate su `true`, mentre l'ambito di personalizzazione della pagina viene impostato a livello di utente.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.IsShared%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AllowEdit%2A>

trans-unit.source: A Boolean value that indicates whether the control should be displayed.
trans-unit.target: Valore booleano che indica se il controllo deve essere visualizzato.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il valore predefinito è <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a string that contains the title text displayed in the title bar of an <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene una stringa che contiene il testo del titolo visualizzato nella barra del titolo di un <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart"> </xref> controllo.

trans-unit.source: The DisplayTitle property returns either the current value of the base <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.Part.Title%2A> property or, if the control has no title, a calculated value.
trans-unit.target: La proprietà DisplayTitle restituisce il valore corrente della base <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.Part.Title%2A>proprietà oppure, se il controllo non ha titolo, un valore calcolato.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.Part.Title%2A>

trans-unit.source: The calculated value consists of a localizable resource string for untitled controls.
trans-unit.target: Il valore calcolato è costituito da una stringa di risorsa localizzabile per controlli senza titolo.

trans-unit.source: In the cases where no value is assigned to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.Part.Title%2A> property, the value of the DisplayTitle property differs from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.Part.Title%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Nei casi in cui viene assegnato alcun valore per il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.Part.Title%2A>proprietà, il valore della proprietà DisplayTitle differisce dal <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.Part.Title%2A>proprietà.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.Part.Title%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.Part.Title%2A>

trans-unit.source: Because the DisplayTitle property is designed to be a read-only, calculated property to get the actual current value of the displayed title at run time, do not attempt to use this property to set a title for an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> control.
trans-unit.target: Poiché la proprietà DisplayTitle è progettata per essere di sola lettura, la proprietà calcolata per ottenere il valore effettivo corrente del titolo visualizzato in fase di esecuzione, non tentare di utilizzare questa proprietà per impostare un titolo per un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>controllo.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>

trans-unit.source: To set a title, use the base <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.Part.Title%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Per impostare un titolo, utilizzare la base <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.Part.Title%2A>proprietà.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.Part.Title%2A>

trans-unit.source: A string that represents the complete, visible title of the control.
trans-unit.target: Stringa che rappresenta il titolo del controllo completo visibile.

trans-unit.source: The default value is a calculated, culture-specific string supplied by the .NET Framework.
trans-unit.target: Il valore predefinito è una stringa di impostazioni cultura specifiche fornita da .NET Framework.

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the current state of an <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart"></xref> control's parent zone.
trans-unit.target: Recupera lo stato corrente di un <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart"> </xref> zona padre del controllo.

trans-unit.source: The GetDesignModeState method returns information about the state of the zone that contains an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> control.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo GetDesignModeState restituisce informazioni sullo stato della zona che contiene un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>controllo.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>

trans-unit.source: The state information is returned in the form of a dictionary.
trans-unit.target: Le informazioni sullo stato viene restituite sotto forma di un dizionario.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary> that has the current state of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZoneBase"></xref> zone that contains an <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Un <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>che ha lo stato corrente del <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZoneBase"> </xref> area che contiene un <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart"> </xref> controllo.</xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Control.PreRender"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Genera il <xref href="System.Web.UI.Control.PreRender"> </xref> evento.

trans-unit.source: In addition to calling the base <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.OnPreRender%2A> method, the OnPreRender method also checks the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.Display%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Oltre a chiamare la base <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.OnPreRender%2A>metodo, il metodo OnPreRender controlla inoltre le <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.Display%2A>proprietà.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.Display%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Control.OnPreRender%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the value is `false`, meaning that the control should not be displayed, then the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Visible%2A> property is also set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: Se il valore è `false`, vale a dire che il controllo non deve essere visualizzato, il <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Visible%2A>anche proprietà è impostata su `false`.</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Visible%2A>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.EventArgs> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Un <xref:System.EventArgs>che contiene i dati dell'evento.</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZoneBase"></xref> that contains the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart"></xref> control is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZoneBase"> </xref> che contiene il <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart"> </xref> controllo <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Applies the characteristics of the design-mode state to the current <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZoneBase"></xref> zone that contains an <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Applica le caratteristiche dello stato della modalità di progettazione corrente <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZoneBase"> </xref> area che contiene un <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart"> </xref> controllo.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary> that contains state data for displaying the zone.
trans-unit.target: Un <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>che contiene i dati sullo stato per la visualizzazione della zona.</xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the property values from a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> control for its associated <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Recupera i valori di proprietà da un <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> controllo per la proprietà associata <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart"> </xref> controllo.

trans-unit.source: The SyncChanges method is a critical method on an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> control.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo SyncChanges è di importanza critica in un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>controllo.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>

trans-unit.source: It is defined as an abstract method in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> class, and must be implemented by inherited controls.
trans-unit.target: Viene definito come un metodo astratto nel <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>classe e devono essere implementati da controlli ereditati.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>

trans-unit.source: The purpose of the method is to retrieve the current values from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control referenced in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.WebPartToEdit%2A> property, and update the fields in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> control with those values so a user can edit them.
trans-unit.target: Lo scopo del metodo consiste nel recuperare i valori correnti dal <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>controllo a cui fa riferimento il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.WebPartToEdit%2A>, proprietà e aggiornare i campi nel <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>controllo con tali valori in modo che un utente può modificarli.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.WebPartToEdit%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: The SyncChanges method is called whenever the values in the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control might have changed.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo SyncChanges viene chiamato ogni volta che i valori associati <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>controllo potrebbe essere state modificate.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: For every <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> control, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZoneBase> zone that contains the control calls the SyncChanges method immediately after calling the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.ApplyChanges%2A> method, so that the values in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> control are always synchronized with the values in the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control.
trans-unit.target: Per ogni <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>(controllo), il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZoneBase>area che contiene il controllo chiama il metodo SyncChanges immediatamente dopo la chiamata di <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.ApplyChanges%2A>(metodo), in modo che i valori nel <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>controllo sono sempre sincronizzate con i valori nell'oggetto associato <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>controllo.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.ApplyChanges%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZoneBase> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>

trans-unit.source: Another case where the SyncChanges method is called is when a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control is entering edit mode.
trans-unit.target: Un altro caso in cui viene chiamato il metodo SyncChanges è quando un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>controllo passa alla modalità di modifica.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The SyncChanges method is not called after the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.ApplyChanges%2A> method if that method returns `false`, because in that case, an error has occurred.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > SyncChanges il metodo non viene chiamato dopo il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.ApplyChanges%2A>metodo se tale metodo restituisce `false`, perché in tal caso, si è verificato un errore.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.ApplyChanges%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"></xref> control associated with the current Web page.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un riferimento di <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"> </xref> controllo associata a una pagina Web corrente.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> control needs a reference to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> instance because it must check the current personalization scope of the page to determine the value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.Display%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>controllo richiede un riferimento al <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>poiché deve verificare l'ambito di personalizzazione della pagina per determinare il valore dell'istanza di <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.Display%2A>proprietà.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.Display%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>

trans-unit.source: Personalization scope is determined by checking the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.Scope%2A> property, which is accessed through the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.Personalization%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Ambito di personalizzazione viene determinato selezionando la <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.Scope%2A>proprietà, è possibile accedere mediante il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.Personalization%2A>proprietà.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.Personalization%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.Scope%2A>

trans-unit.source: A reference to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"></xref> on the page.
trans-unit.target: Un riferimento di <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"> </xref> nella pagina.

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> control that is currently being edited.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un riferimento di <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> controllo che è in corso di modifica.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control (or other server or user control) that is currently being edited corresponds to the value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.SelectedWebPart%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>controllo (o altri controlli server o utente) che è attualmente in corso di modifica corrisponde al valore del <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.SelectedWebPart%2A>proprietà.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.SelectedWebPart%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: Only one <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control can be edited at a time, and when a control is in edit mode, the WebPartToEdit property provides a reference to that control.
trans-unit.target: Un solo <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>controllo può essere modificato in un momento e quando un controllo è in modalità di modifica, la proprietà WebPartToEdit fornisce un riferimento a tale controllo.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: After the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZoneBase> zone has added the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> control to its collection of controls, it then assigns the value of its own <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZoneBase.WebPartToEdit%2A> property to the WebPartToEdit property on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> control.
trans-unit.target: Dopo il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZoneBase>zona ha aggiunto la <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>controllo alla raccolta di controlli, quindi assegna il valore di un proprio <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZoneBase.WebPartToEdit%2A>proprietà per la proprietà WebPartToEdit il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>controllo.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZoneBase.WebPartToEdit%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZoneBase>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> control uses the WebPartToEdit property especially in its two critical methods--<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.ApplyChanges%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.SyncChanges%2A>--to get and set the property values on the associated control.
trans-unit.target: Un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>controllo utilizza la proprietà WebPartToEdit soprattutto in due metodi più importanti:<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.ApplyChanges%2A> e <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.SyncChanges%2A>-consente di ottenere e impostare i valori delle proprietà del controllo associato.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.SyncChanges%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.ApplyChanges%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> that is currently in edit mode.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> che è attualmente in modalità di modifica.

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZoneBase"></xref> zone that contains an <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un riferimento di <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZoneBase"> </xref> area che contiene un <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart"> </xref> controllo.

trans-unit.source: Although the Zone property is read-only, it provides a reference to the zone object that contains the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> control, and you can programmatically change property values on the zone itself.
trans-unit.target: Anche se la proprietà di zona è di sola lettura, fornisce un riferimento all'oggetto zona che contiene il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>controllo ed è possibile modificare i valori delle proprietà nella zona stessa a livello di codice.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZoneBase"></xref> that contains the control.
trans-unit.target: Un <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZoneBase"> </xref> che contiene il controllo.
